title: Implement TDD SSE swarm trace stream with sample scenario artifacts
description: Add backend endpoints and orchestration stubs for planner confirm -> run spawn, SSE run streaming + replay endpoint, sample email scenario prompt/evaluation artifacts, and .txt sample SSE output capture. Follow TDD and commit in small increments.

title: Add OpenRouter chat streaming reasoning capture
description: Implement stream:true chat/completions parsing for delta.content, delta.reasoning_details, final usage; emit llm chunk events to runtime/SSE and persist to txt sample; use gemini 3 pro reasoning model config.

title: Verify OpenRouter+Weave full-test endpoint after key update
